summary: This mod adds Jedi Robes (new models). For now: JUST FOR BULKY MALE characters.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=Orange][size=+5]JoO\'s Jedi Robe V2 beta (by JackoO)[/size][/color][/b][/font]


current version 0.5 beta

[b][color=red]Please read this before download![/color][/b]

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Description:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
The robes can be found in a NEW shack in Riverwood. Check out its basement!


This mod is still WIP! I upload this mainly for testing purposes (so please give feedback)
Before you download, or install read the following!:

-The robes are still not finished
-For now there is ONLY a male version!
-The robes look best on bulky charakters!

So this mod is mainly just for fun. If you wanna change your characters appereance to fit the robe, open console and type \"showracemenu\"

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=Yellow][size=+1]Please take pictures (and upload here) of your usage of the Robes and upload here![/size][/color][/b][/font]


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Background:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
Check out my skyrim other Skyrim mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9205]JoO\'s Imperial Praetorian Armor[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3733]JoO\'s Jedi Robe[/url]

You play Fallout New Vegas? Check out my FNV Mod:

[url=http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=45203]JoO\'s Modern Armory[/url]


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Content:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
this mod includes:
- Jedi Robes (+hoods)
- Sith Robe (+hood)

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Installation:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
Copy files to \"yourSkyrimfolder\"\\\\
Start Skyrim Launcher,check the JoOJediRobeV2.esp and startgame


[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Uninstall:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
uncheck JoOJediRobeV2.esp in Skyrim Launcher
delete the .esp file and the .bsa

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Credits: [/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the CreationKit
Thanks to cgtextures.com
\"One or more textures on this 3D-model have been created with images from CGTextures.com. These images may not be redistributed by default. Please visit www.cgtextures.com for more information\"
Thanks to skyrimnexus
Thanks to all creators of blender
Thanks to all creators of niftools

[font=Palatino Linotype][b][color=orange][size=+3]Licensing:[/size][/color][/b][/font]
---------------------------------------------------------
You are not allowed to use any part of this mod without my permission (since this is not finished)

For all objects modified with base skyrim resources: all rights reserved to bethesda softworks


---------------------------------------------------------
Thanks for all comments! (and bug reports!) and HAVE FUN with It!
author: JackoO
